thread.section_title: Hotel Baume - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great boutique hotel...but thin walls!
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel...but thin walls! - Review of Hotel Baume, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: chandraviolin
title: Great boutique hotel...but thin walls!
text:
This hotel is great, the service is cordial, it is very clean and the rooms, even though a bit small, very nice and clean. The shower is nice and greta water pressure! I got a room facing the court, it was very quiet. Lovely breakfast.
However, depending on the other guests in the hotel it can be difficult to sleep. I was there ion a Thursday night, so many guests came late in, half or completely drunk and woke me up 3 times...what a shame.
I you are not a light sleeper, I would recommend. If not...not sure.
